title: Una Kim from Keep Company - Episode 104
itunes:title: Una Kim from Keep Company - Episode 104
description:
Happy two year anniversary to the show! To commemorate, I had Una Kim from Keep Company who are an amazing shoe company in Los Angeles. Una has many roots within music and Keep has done cool collaborations with everyone from Bon Iver, Tegan & Sara and Animal Collective. We discuss the punk rock guilt trip, compartmentalization and DIY ethics. Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
